steps.description: To start sorting out this problem, robotically interchange the glyph a at 4 with the glyph w at position 0.
At this point, curiously swap the character d at slot 15 with the symbol h at 1.

Curiously trade the symbol d at position 22 with the symbol f at slot 3.
Now, algorithmically exchange the symbol a at index 23 with the w at location 4.
Now, gently switch the e at position 25 with the symbol i at slot 5.
